Main functionsÂ¶

BunnyFunctions BunnyFunctions contains a set of high level functions to manipulate experiment objects.
BunnyFunctions.Explore(Exp[, lower, limit, ...]) Plot an experiment’s power as a function of the sample size.
BunnyFunctions.Hop(Exp[, limit, power, ...]) Determine an experiment’s sample size through binary search.
BunnyFunctions.Inspect(Exp[, RecomputePower]) Print experiment details.
BunnyFunctions.Imagine(Exp[, samples]) Plot the key statistics of a simulation along with the decision.
